languages.text: "Как смеешь ты попрекать меня смертью нечестивца! Любой слуга Императора должен был пламенем и пласталью принести очищение еретику — или ты дерзнешь богохульствовать, утверждая иное?"

"How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"
languages.original_text: "Как смеешь ты попрекать меня смертью нечестивца! Любой слуга Императора должен был пламенем и пласталью принести очищение еретику — или ты дерзнешь богохульствовать, утверждая иное?"

traits.locale_text: "How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

"How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

languages.text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, mich für den Tod eines Schurken zu maßregeln! Es wäre die Pflicht jedes Dienere des Imperators gewesen, den Ketzer mit Feuer und Plaststahl zu tilgen – oder wollt Ihr unverschämt und lästerlich etwas anderes behaupten?"
languages.original_text: "How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, mich für den Tod eines Schurken zu maßregeln! Es wäre die Pflicht jedes Dienere des Imperators gewesen, den Ketzer mit Feuer und Plaststahl zu tilgen – oder wollt Ihr unverschämt und lästerlich etwas anderes behaupten?"

languages.text: « Comment osez-vous me reprocher la mort d'un homme corrompu ? N'importe quel serviteur de l'Empereur aurait eu le devoir de purifier cet hérétique par le feu et le plastacier... Auriez-vous l'audace de me soutenir le contraire, au risque de vous rendre coupable de blasphème ? »
languages.original_text: "How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment osez-vous me reprocher la mort d'un homme corrompu ? N'importe quel serviteur de l'Empereur aurait eu le devoir de purifier cet hérétique par le feu et le plastacier... Auriez-vous l'audace de me soutenir le contraire, au risque de vous rendre coupable de blasphème ? »

languages.text: “死的人是异端分子，可你竟敢谴责我？你好大的胆子！帝皇的每位仆人，都有责任用烈焰与钢铁来净化异端分子。还是说，你打算草率地质疑这种认知，提出另一种亵渎神明的说法？”
languages.original_text: "How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: “死的人是异端分子，可你竟敢谴责我？你好大的胆子！帝皇的每位仆人，都有责任用烈焰与钢铁来净化异端分子。还是说，你打算草率地质疑这种认知，提出另一种亵渎神明的说法？”

languages.text: «¡¿Cómo osa echarme en cara la muerte de un hombre malvado?! Es deber de todo sirviente del Emperador purificar al hereje con fuego y plastiacero, ¿o tiene una opinión distinta y blasfema?».
languages.original_text: "How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: «¡¿Cómo osa echarme en cara la muerte de un hombre malvado?! Es deber de todo sirviente del Emperador purificar al hereje con fuego y plastiacero, ¿o tiene una opinión distinta y blasfema?».

languages.text: 「邪悪な男の死のことで、よくも{mf|俺|私}を責められたものだな！異端者を火とプラスチールで清めるのは、皇帝に仕える者すべての義務じゃないか？それとも君は無謀に、冒涜的にそれを否定するというのか？」
languages.original_text: "How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: 「邪悪な男の死のことで、よくも{mf|俺|私}を責められたものだな！異端者を火とプラスチールで清めるのは、皇帝に仕える者すべての義務じゃないか？それとも君は無謀に、冒涜的にそれを否定するというのか？」

languages.text: "Ne cüretle günahkâr bir adamın ölümü için beni kınarsın? Aksine tüm kâfirleri ateş ve plasçelikle ortadan kaldırmak, İmparator'un hizmetkârları için bir vazifedir! Yoksa küstah bir günahkâr gibi aksini mi iddia edeceksin?"
languages.original_text: "How dare you reprimand me for a wicked man's death! It would have been the duty of any servant of the Emperor to cleanse the heretic with fire and plasteel — or are you going to brashly and blasphemously claim otherwise?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne cüretle günahkâr bir adamın ölümü için beni kınarsın? Aksine, tüm kâfirleri ateş ve plasçelikle ortadan kaldırmak İmparator'un hizmetkârları için bir vazifedir! Yoksa küstah bir günahkâr gibi aksini mi iddia edeceksin?"
